A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What the heck is everyone talking about not liking this film.  Are there things to nit-pick about\, sure.  But really\, this is one of THE BEST Star Wars movies EVER made.

It's got a little bit of everything and it's plotlines and story arc aren't nearly as repetitive as Force Awakens.  It's just a really fun\, exciting movie that gives us all sorts of new insights into the Star Wars universe.

Fantastic movie\, I'll be going back while it's still in theatres!!
